input-new.description:
There is no DEMO Hospital. 
Enter a hospital name and register a DEMO hospital.

The hospital's key will be saved on this browser, and the hospital blockchain address will be saved to the blockchain for the DEMO.

err-name-too-long.title: Input Error
err-name-too-long.msg: Hospital Name must be 32 bytes or less.

input-patient-address.description: For the DEMO, the patient's address will be directly saved to this browser's local storage.

err-no-hospital.title: No Hospital Registered
err-no-hospital.msg:
A DEMO hospital has not been added.
Please add a hospital in advance.

create-new.title: Doctor Registration
create-new.msg:
DEMO doctor has not been added yet.
Did you add a DEMO doctor?

invalid-patient-address.title: Input Error
invalid-patient-address.msg: Target patient address must be 40 digits hex.

write-complete.title: Saved Successfully
write-complete.msg: Medical record has been saved successfully.

content.no-hospital-registered: Hospital for DEMO has not been registered.

input-new.description:
There is no DEMO Patient. 
Enter patient information and register a DEMO patient.

The Patient's key will be saved on this browser, and the information will be saved with access control to the blockchain for DEMO.

allow-access-to-hospital.submit: Add Read/Write auth to the hospital. (As read with QR code)

deny-access-from-hospital.submit: Remove Read/Write auth from the hospital. (As read with QR code)

add-permission.title: Added Permission Successfully
add-permission.msg: read/write permission added to DEMO hospital Successfully.

remove-permission.title: Removed Permission Successfully
remove-permission.msg: read/write permission removed from DEMO hospital Successfully.
